thread.title: Woman makes half-court shot, then BF proposes
thread.title_full: Woman makes half-court shot, then BF proposes

author: USA TODAY
title: Woman makes half-court shot, then BF proposes
text:
Woman makes half-court shot, then BF proposes This is crazy! Post to Facebook Woman makes half-court shot, then BF proposes This is crazy!  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/woman-siena-saints-fan-surprised-on-court-proposal-half-court-shot-made-video-crazy/   Join the Nation's Conversation To   Woman makes half-court shot, then BF proposes Alysha Tsuji , USA TODAY 9:54   
What a surprise! (Photo: Siena Saints YouTube) 
You've seen hilarious stadium proposals and great on-court proposals , but have you ever seen a proposal happen after the girlfriend drained a half-court shot? 
That happened at a Siena Saints game. Hit a half court shot ✔️️Get proposed to by the @DunkinDonuts mascot ✔️️Have a night, Erin Tobin https://t.co/PRjgmmwZNr #SCTop10 — Siena Saints (@SienaSaints) February 17, 2017 
The woman made a half-court shot and right after being so happy because making a half-court shot at a game is an awesome thing, her boyfriend popped out of the Dunkin' Donuts mascot costume and proposed to her. 
Imagine the rush of emotions - first you make a crazy shot, and now you're getting married. 
Now that man can brag about how his fiancée buried a half-court shot like Steph Curry just before accepting his proposal. That'll be a fantastic story at their wedding and for years to come.
